metadata.infoNew:
To ensure permanent access to your NFTs, you need to store their metadata and files on the web. 

Would you like to store your NFT metadata in decentralized way?
metadata.title: Prepare NFT metadata

dynamic.content: If you plan to update or reveal metadata over time, after you’ve deployed the NFT Collection, this is your way to go. This solution uses IPNS records with data stored on IPFS.
dynamic.title: Dynamic NFT collection

static.content: If you plan to create an NFT Collection and not make any post-deployment changes, a static collection is your jam. The data will be stored on IPFS.
static.title: Static NFT collection

content.purpose: Purpose: Unique Network is a Polkadot parachain optimized specifically for NFTs and gaming applications.
content.title: Unique network
benefits: Specialized NFT Infrastructure: Unique is designed solely for NFTs, offering specific tools and features that are fine-tuned for NFT minting and management.
Low-Cost and Eco-Friendly: The network operates with lower transaction fees and a more energy-efficient consensus mechanism compared to Ethereum.
NFT Customization: Developers have more granular control over NFT metadata, including complex logic such as dynamic NFTs that can evolve based on certain conditions.
Native Support for On-Chain Features: Includes native support for fractional ownership, nested NFTs (NFTs containing other NFTs), and NFT marketplaces.
Cross-Chain Capabilities: As a Polkadot parachain, Unique offers cross-chain functionality for NFTs, enabling them to be traded or utilized across different networks within the Polkadot ecosystem.
Developer-Friendly: Unique provides a comprehensive set of SDKs, APIs, and ready-made NFT tools, reducing the complexity of developing NFT-based applications.

content.content: Use case: Best suited for NFT-focused projects, particularly those that require advanced features like dynamic NFTs, fractional ownership, and low-cost minting.

content.title: Astar Network
content.purpose: Purpose: Astar is a multi-chain dApp hub on Polkadot that supports Ethereum, WebAssembly, and Layer 2 solutions.
benefits: Multi-VM Support: Astar supports both Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) and WebAssembly (WASM), providing flexibility for developers who prefer different environments for NFT minting.
Layer 2 Support: Allows for scaling solutions through Layer 2 technology, reducing costs and increasing efficiency for NFT minting.
Cross-Chain Interoperability: Like Moonbeam, Astar benefits from Polkadot's cross-chain capabilities, meaning NFTs minted on Astar can be transferred or interact with other Polkadot parachains.
Dapp Staking Mechanism: Developers can stake Astar tokens to earn rewards, providing additional incentives for NFT projects deployed on Astar.
Growing Ecosystem: Astar is becoming a dApp hub, meaning NFT projects can integrate with various decentralized applications.

content.content: Suitable for projects looking to leverage multi-chain capabilities with the flexibility of EVM and WASM for more sophisticated NFT minting solutions.

content.title: Moonbeam (Mainnet)
content.content: Purpose: Moonbeam is a fully Ethereum-compatible smart contract platform on Polkadot, designed for cross-chain applications.
benefits: Ethereum Compatibility: Full support for Ethereum smart contracts and tools (like OpenZeppelin, MetaMask), enabling developers to mint NFTs without learning new languages.
Cross-Chain Interoperability: Through Polkadot’s relay chain, NFTs minted on Moonbeam can interact with other chains in the Polkadot ecosystem.
Low Gas Fees: Gas fees on Moonbeam are significantly lower compared to Ethereum, making minting NFTs more cost-efficient.
Active DeFi and NFT Ecosystem: Moonbeam's rapidly growing DeFi ecosystem also creates opportunities for NFTs to be used in decentralized finance.
Multi-chain Vision: Moonbeam allows NFTs to be minted with the potential to interact with multiple blockchains through Polkadot’s cross-chain capabilities.

content.content: Use case: Ideal for projects requiring full production deployment of Ethereum-based NFTs with cross-chain interactions.

content.title: MOONBASE (Moonbeam Testnet)
content.content: Purpose: Moonbase is the testnet for Moonbeam, designed for testing and experimentation.
benefits: Low Costs: As a testnet, transaction fees are negligible, allowing for cost-effective testing of NFT minting processes.
Ethereum Compatibility: Developers can test Ethereum-based smart contracts and NFTs in an environment that mirrors Ethereum’s functionality.
Web3 Compatible: You can use Ethereum development tools like MetaMask, Remix, and Truffle.
Access to Full Moonbeam Ecosystem: Provides the opportunity to test features before deploying them on Moonbeam, ensuring seamless migration of NFT minting solutions to the mainnet.
Free Tokens for Testing: You can request tokens from a faucet, making testing free and accessible.

content.content: Use case: Best suited for developers who want to test minting processes and smart contract deployment before moving to production.
